languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую единицу бонуса Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Strength describes how physically strong the character is. It affects the damage the character inflicts with melee weapons, or allows to lift heavier objects. For each Strength bonus point characters deal 1 additional damage with melee weapons.
It also affects the Athletics skill.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}代表角色身体的强壮程度。力量会影响角色使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，也可以让角色搬起更重的物件。每有1点力量加值，角色的单手近战武器伤害提高5%，双手近战武器伤害提高10%。
此外，力量还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。

此外，力量还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}代表角色身体的强壮程度。力量会影响角色使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，也可以让角色搬起更重的物件。每有1点力量{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，角色的单手近战武器伤害提高5%，双手近战武器伤害提高10%。
此外，力量还会影响{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}运动{/g}技能。

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} (FUE) representa el poderío físico de un personaje. Afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que el personaje inflige con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y le permite levantar objetos más pesados. Por cada punto de bonificación de Fuerza, el personaje inflige un +5 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo de una mano y un +10 % más con armas cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g} .
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} (FUE) representa el poderío físico de un personaje. Afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que el personaje inflige con un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} y le permite levantar objetos más pesados. Por cada punto de bonificación de Fuerza, el personaje inflige un +5 % más de daño con armas cuerpo a cuerpo de una mano y un +10 % más con armas cuerpo a cuerpo a dos manos.
También afecta a la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletismo{/g} .

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}はキャラクターの物理的な強さを示す。キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}量に影響し、重いオブジェクトを持ち上げることができる。STRのボーナスポイント1につき、片手近接武器によるダメージが+5%増加する。両手武器の場合、ダメージが+10%増加する。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響する。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}はキャラクターの物理的な強さを示す。キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器で与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}量に影響し、重いオブジェクトを持ち上げることができる。STRのボーナスポイント1につき、片手近接武器によるダメージが+5%増加する。両手武器の場合、ダメージが+10%増加する。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}にも影響する。

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}（STR）はキャラクターの物理的な強さを示す。キャラクターが近接武器で与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}量に影響し、重いオブジェクトを持ち上げることができる。腕力の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ポイント1つにつき、片手{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器によるダメージが1追加され、ダメージが5%増加する。両手武器の場合、このボーナスは2倍になり、腕力ボーナス1点につき追加ダメージ2点、追加ダメージ10%になる。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}身体能力{/g}スキルにも影響する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую единицу бонуса Силы персонаж наносит дополнительно +5% урона одноручным оружием {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнего боя{/g} и +10% урона двуручным оружием ближнего боя.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} point of Strength, characters deal 5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and 10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} skill.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на урон, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусную{/g} единицу Силы персонаж наносит 1 дополнительный урон рукопашным оружием.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила{/g} (СИЛ) показывает, насколько персонаж физически силен. Сила влияет на урон, который персонаж наносит рукопашным оружием, и позволяет поднимать тяжелые предметы. За каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусную{/g} единицу Силы персонаж наносит 1 дополнительный урон рукопашным оружием.
Также эта характеристика влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}навык{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Атлетика{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} (STÄ) gibt die körperliche Stärke eines Charakters an. Sie wirkt sich auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus, den ein Charakter mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} verursacht, und ermöglicht ihm, schwerere Gegenstände zu heben. Für jeden zusätzlichen Punkt Stärke verursachen Charaktere mit einhändigen Nahkampfwaffen 5 %, mit zweihändigen Nahkampfwaffen 10 % mehr Schaden.
Wirkt sich auch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} aus.

For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.

Sie wirkt sich auf den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus, den ein Charakter mit {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfwaffen{/g} verursacht, und ermöglicht ihm, schwerere Gegenstände zu heben. Wirkt sich auch auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletik{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g} aus.

languages.text:
La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} (FOR) représente la force physique d'un personnage. Elle détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} qu'il inflige avec les armes de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g} et lui permet de soulever des objets lourds. Pour chaque point bonus de Force, les personnages infligent 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à une main et 10 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à deux mains.
Elle influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR) represents how physically strong a character is. It affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} a character inflicts with {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapons and allows them to lift heavier objects. For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
It also affects the {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athletics{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g}.

La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} (FOR) représente la force physique d'un personnage. Pour chaque point {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Force, les personnages infligent 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à une main et 10 % de dégâts supplémentaires avec les armes de mêlée à deux mains.
Elle influe également sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Athlétisme{/g}.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} (KUV), bir karakterin fiziksel açıdan ne kadar güçlü olduğunu belirtir. Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahlarıyla verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} etki eder ve ağır nesneleri kaldırabilmesine olanak tanır. Karakter sahip olduğu her ilave Kuvvet puanı sayesinde tek el yakın dövüş silahlarıyla %5, çift el yakın dövüş silahlarıyla ise %10 daha fazla hasar verir.
Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAthletics}Atletizm{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yeteneğine{/g} de etki eder.

For each point of a Strength bonus, characters deal +5% more damage with one-handed melee weapons and +10% more damage with two-handed melee weapons.
